title: Birds and their characteristics
brief_description: Shows in detail the characteristics which differentiate birds from the other groups of vertebrates-feathers, wings and legs, warm-bloodedness and beaks. Demonstrates the adaptations and special characteristics of several kinds of birds, and shows details of a bird’s flight using slow-motion photography. No other credits available.
